text: wma kan ythyaa li'ahad 'an yati bhdha alquran min eind ghayr allh, li'anah la yuqadar ealaa dhlk 'ahad min alkhlq, wlkn allah 'anzalah msddiqa lilkutub alty anzlha ealaa anbyayh; li'ana din allah wahd, wafi hdha alquran bayan watafsil lamaa shreh allah lamt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, la shaka fi 'ana hdha alquran mwhaan min rabi alealmyn
